LanguageData.BandwidthCost.label: bandwidth cost
LanguageData.BandwidthCost.description: How much bandwidth this mech consumes when under mechanitor control.
LanguageData.CancerRate.label: cancer rate factor
LanguageData.CancerRate.description: A multiplier on how likely this person is to develop cancer in any given time frame.
LanguageData.ControlTakingTime.label: control taking time
LanguageData.ControlTakingTime.description: How many seconds it will take for a mechanitor to take control of this mech.
LanguageData.EMPResistance.label: EMP resistance
LanguageData.EMPResistance.description: This mechanoid has special shielding and shock-dissipation filaments that reduce the effect of EMP damage by this percentage. This reduces the duration of stuns caused by EMP.
LanguageData.Fertility.label: fertility
LanguageData.Fertility.description: Fertility affects the chance of a pregnancy occurring. Pregnancy chance is dependent on the fertility of both partners. This also affects the chance of successfully implanting an embryo in a surrogate.
LanguageData.HemogenGainFactor.label: hemogen gain multiplier
LanguageData.HemogenGainFactor.description: A multiplier on the amount of hemogen gained.
LanguageData.MechBandwidth.label: mech bandwidth
LanguageData.MechBandwidth.description: How much bandwidth a mechanitor has. More bandwidth allows a mechanitor to produce and control more mechs at the same time.\n\nLosing bandwidth means losing control of mechs, leaving them without an overseer. Such mechs can eventually become feral if not re-dominated.
LanguageData.MechControlGroups.label: mech control groups
LanguageData.MechControlGroups.description: How many control groups this mechanitor can direct independently. Each control group can be given its own separate orders.
LanguageData.MechEnergyLossPerHP.label: repair energy cost
LanguageData.MechEnergyLossPerHP.description: The amount of energy that this mechanoid loses for every 100 damage repaired.
LanguageData.MechEnergyUsageFactor.label: energy usage multiplier
LanguageData.MechEnergyUsageFactor.description: A multiplier on how fast a mechanoid consumes its energy reserves while operating.
LanguageData.MechFormingSpeed.label: mech gestation speed
LanguageData.MechFormingSpeed.description: A multiplier on the speed at which this mechanitor can form new mechanoids at a gestator.
LanguageData.MechRemoteRepairDistance.label: mech remote repair distance
LanguageData.MechRemoteRepairDistance.description: How far away a mech can be during remote repair.
LanguageData.MechRemoteShieldDistance.label: mech remote shield distance
LanguageData.MechRemoteShieldDistance.description: The maximum range at which a mechanitor can place a shield on a mechanoid.
LanguageData.MechRemoteShieldEnergy.label: mech remote shield energy
LanguageData.MechRemoteShieldEnergy.description: The energy a remote shield will have when created by a mechanitor.
LanguageData.MechRepairSpeed.label: mech repair speed
LanguageData.MechRepairSpeed.description: A multiplier on how fast a mechanitor can repair mechanoids.
LanguageData.RawNutritionFactor.label: raw nutrition multiplier
LanguageData.RawNutritionFactor.description: A multiplier on how nutritious raw food is for this person. Note that since meals usually have more nutrition than their raw ingredients, a boost to this stat may only mean the person gets the same nutrition from raw food as if it were cooked.
LanguageData.RestFallRateFactor.label: sleep fall rate
LanguageData.RestFallRateFactor.description: A multiplier on the speed that a person's sleep need falls.
LanguageData.SubcoreEncodingSpeed.label: subcore encoding speed
LanguageData.SubcoreEncodingSpeed.description: A multiplier on how fast a mechanitor can create subcores.
LanguageData.WastepacksPerRecharge.label: wastepacks per recharge
LanguageData.WastepacksPerRecharge.description: How many toxic wastepacks this mechanoid will generate at a mech recharger when going from 0 to 100% energy. Larger mechanoids will generally create more toxic wastepacks.
